name: RolloRogue
description:
Get the highest score possible in this bullet hell!

The catch -- you can't shoot. Your only hope are these "Lucky Dice..."

Pick them up, then use them with Right-Click/Right Bumper. 

CONTROLS

----------------

Keyboard and Mouse:

R - restart

WASD - Move

Left-Click - Dash

Right-Click - Use Lucky Roll

Controller:

Joystick - Move

Right Bumper - Dash

Left Bumper - Use Lucky Roll
